itunes:title: Ilya’s Ex-Lover Exposes Him
title: Ilya’s Ex-Lover Exposes Him
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary: We have one of Ilya's former lovers come on the podcast to talk what he was really like between the sheets, Joe struggled vlogging, and valentines is ruined. Honestly this one is a 10/10 so hope you enjoy! If you dig it, please rate us on apple podcasts!!
